basics.name: Omar Olivares Urrutia
basics.label: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer with a strong background in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) who loves turning complex ideas into practical solutions. I've worked as an AI Engineer, Developer Relations Engineer, and freelance content creator, crafting engaging AI-focused content. I've helped build AI-powered products such as Kilo Code (an autonomous coding agent), Emergent Mind (a RAG system for CS research), and a range of scalable web applications for early-stage startups.

education.summary: Specialization in natural language processing and Artificial Intelligence. Minor in Musical Composition. Graduated with honors. Developed a fine-tuning of the `gpt-3.5-turbo` language model to help PAES students through personalized tutoring as an undergraduate thesis.
Focus on computer architecture, algorithms, and software development.

publications.name: Bachelor Thesis
publications.summary: Optimization of Language Models for Chile’s Mathematics Higher Education Admission Test (PAES): A Proof of Concept
highlights: Supervised by Dr. Xaviera A. Lopez Cortes
Supervised by Dr. Maria D. Aravena Diaz
Supervised by Dr. Sergio I. Hernández Alvarez

work.name: Kilo Code
work.summary: I travelled from Chile to Amsterdam to spearhead the development of Kilo Code, a clone of the leading open-source Coding Agents, as a Developer Advocate, joining a team of 12 engineers from project inception to founder mode

Leading AI development for Emergent Mind's innovative arXiv research discovery and learning platform. As part of a small, high-impact team, I'm helping build the next generation of AI assistants for learning and computer science research.
highlights: Collaborate closely with the founder on product strategy and product development
Implement and fine-tune deep learning models for research discovery and analysis
Design pipelines with RAG to improve search result quality and relevance
Conduct experiments to improve model performance and accuracy
Oversee QA processes for AI-driven features
Create tools for providing research-backed answers efficiently
Conceptualize and prototype innovative AI features to drive platform growth
work.description: AI-powered research discovery platform for arXiv content
work.name: Emergent Mind

work.summary: I lead content creation for Neura Pod, a popular series exploring cutting-edge neurotechnology topics including brain-machine interfaces, neurological conditions, and artificial intelligence. As a full-stack content producer, I translate complex scientific concepts into engaging, accessible content for a broad audience.
highlights: Translated complex scientific concepts into engaging, accessible content for a broad audience
Managed end-to-end production from ideation to publication
Developed concepts, wrote scripts, recorded voiceovers, edited videos, and oversaw distribution
Contributed to channel growth exceeding 80,000 YouTube subscribers
Produced multiple viral videos surpassing 200,000 views each
Expanded Neura Pod's presence across major social media platforms
work.description: Popular YouTube channel about neurotechnology and brain-machine interfaces
work.name: Neura Pod

work.summary: Started my career in technical content creation, learning the basics of audiovisual production and scientific communication.
work.description: YouTube channel focused on neurotechnology and AI education
work.name: Neura Pod

work.summary: Optimized MongoDB and SQL usage to reduce costs.
work.description: Technology company focused on database optimization

work.summary: Help to rebuild the platform into a microservices-based architecture.

volunteer.summary: Neuromatch is an online community of computational neuroscientists whose mission is to foster inclusive global interactions for learning, mentorship, networking, and professional development.
